IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_rank_name') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_rank_name GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_rank_name @guild_id dbo.id_t, @rank_id TINYINT, @rank_name NVARCHAR(10) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Ranks SET name = @rank_name WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND rank_id = @rank_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
